text:
@piersmorgan And you, @piersmorgan need to  button it, you're a "journalist" not an virologist/biologically qualified or an epidemiologist and you are damaging your own integrity by this constant rant. Report the news don't make it and don't give us your opinion, it's now worthless
#COVID19
